data.title: Luna Amarilla Racehorse Profile, Stats, Form Guide, News & Results
data.meta_description: View the horse profile of Luna Amarilla including all the information you need like statistics, upcoming races, form guides, latest news and previous results. Make sure you don't miss a thing Luna Amarilla does By adding this race horse to your Racenet blackbook.
data.text:
Luna Amarilla is a 7yo ch Unknown from United States trained by Nestor Marrero, who is based at . It is sired by the stallion Capo Bastone out of the dam Playinthecity.

Luna Amarilla is yet to break its maiden status, having not won a race yet from 28 attempts. During its most recent race at Colonial Downs on 13th Aug 2024, Luna Amarilla was ridden by Matias Bravo and finished 4th, behind the winner null.
